solution_line_template: If the epic poem currently contains {current_lines} lines, the total number of lines added for it to reach {target_lines} is {target_lines}-{current_lines} = {lines_to_add} lines.
If a person adds {lines_per_month} lines to the poem every month, it will take {lines_to_add}/{lines_per_month}= {months_needed} months for the poem to contain {target_lines} lines.
